name: Construct1
description:
This is a completed tutorial for Construct 3.

To put your Construct files on itch, you'll need to export your construct game as a .zip file. That means:

 if you try to upload your Construct save file to itch, it will not work. That file, with the .c3p suffix, is only for saving and loading into the Construct game editor. 

So, be sure to select Menu > Project > Export in the Construct editor when you want to create the .zip file for your game that can then be used to put it here on itch.io as a playable HTML5 file (read more).
